user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, well-fitting underwear that I could wear daily without discomfort or the need for constant adjustment.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that offered a low-rise fit. The positive review highlighted comfort, which aligned with my need for everyday wear. The simplicity of the design and the assurance of comfort were key factors in my decision.

The recommendation from others about the comfort and quality of the fabric influenced my decision. I was drawn to the idea of a product that felt similar to a trusted brand from the past, which made me feel confident in my choice.

I was attracted to the advanced features like moisture-wicking and odor reduction, which promised all-day comfort. The detailed description of the fabric and fit made me feel assured that this product would meet my needs effectively.
I was impressed by the combination of affordability and quality. The review emphasized the nice fit and feel of the material, which resonated with my desire for comfortable and reliable underwear.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer good quality and comfort at an affordable price. I value items that are durable, have a soft feel, and provide a good fit, especially if they allow for some flexibility in sizing. I appreciate features like moisture-wicking technology and breathable materials, as they enhance comfort during physical activities. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. On the other hand, I dislike items that are scratchy or uncomfortable against the skin, as well as those that do not fit well or are poorly constructed. I also prefer not to deal with products that require excessive maintenance or do not hold up well after washing.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, well-fitting underwear for daily wear without discomfort or constant adjustment. within my expected price range: [15.0, 24.99]
What specific fabric do you prefer in your underwear for daily wear?

I prefer underwear made of soft and breathable fabric like cotton or a blend with moisture-wicking properties for daily wear. It's essential for me to have comfortable and durable underwear that I can rely on throughout the day. What can you recommend in this category?

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Eversoft Cotton Brief Underwear, Tag Free & Breathable, Available in Plus Size> / Item ID: B0956HNH2Y / Price: $15.97 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Start your day off right with Fruit of the Loom’s newly reinvented cotton boyshorts. The style you love is now softer than ever and built for all day comfort. We’ve used a finer yarn to create a wonderfully soft feel that will have you ready to tackle the day. These boy shorts come with a durable, plush-backed waistband that is guaranteed to remain ravel free wash after wash, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner for ultimate comfort.']
